author: Abhinavdoctor
title: True Essence of Indian Tradition "Athithi Devo Bhav"
text: Centre of the london.Very close to all the major attractions.Quick check in am thankful to Anushree and Patrisia..Nice property..Rooms are big, decor is nice..Lobby is good Kona restaurant is cool and contemporary.
